Title: Pilot
Plot: In the series premiere of "Awkward", Jenna Hamilton finds out that getting the boy of her dreams isn't all it's cracked up to be. When a mysterious letter leads to a misunderstanding of epic proportions, Jenna realizes that her new stigma might be her ticket to social visibility.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Jessica Lu, Mike Faiola, Greer Grammer
